懍字的基本解释

懍
lǐn
同“懔”。

懍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lǐn］
［《廣韻》力稔切，上寢，來。］
亦作“懔1”。
(1)危惧；戒惧。
(2)严正貌。参见“懍懍”、“懍然”。
(3)寒冷貌。参见“懍懍”。
[②]［lǎn］
［《集韻》盧感切，上感，來。］
见“懍2坎”。

懍字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　懍； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页406第02
【廣韻】力稔切【集韻】【韻會】力錦切，?音廩。【集韻】懼貌。【廣韻】敬也。又畏也。【書·泰誓】百姓懍懍。【前漢·食貨志】直爲此懍懍。【註】危也。　又通作稟。【前漢·賈誼傳】直爲此稟稟。又【集韻】或作伈。又通作㐭?。　又【集韻】【韻會】?盧感切，音壈。坎懍，困極也。或作廩。【前漢·揚甘泉賦】下隂潛以慘廩。【註】亦寒涼之意。廩讀如本字，又魯感反。又寒添貌。　又【集韻】巨禁切，音?。心怯也。　俗作?，非。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lǐn］
["Guang Yun" Li Min cut, go to bed, come. ]
Also known as "懔1".
(1) Danger and fear; avoid fear.
(2) Yan Zheng looks. See "slumping", "slumping".
(3) Cold appearance. See "Mumbling".
[②]［lǎn］
["Ji Yun" Lu feels cut and feels, come on. ]
See "懔2 hurdles".
Stupefied

[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　懔; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 406 02
[Guang Yun] Li Jin cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Li Jin cut,? Yin Lin. [Jiyun] Fear of appearance. [Guang Yun] Jing Ye. Fear again. [Book·Thai Oath] The people are stunned. [Previous Han·Shihuo Zhi] This is so stunned. [Note] Danger also.　It's a gift again. [Previous Han·Jia Yi Biography] This is a gift. Also 【Jiyun】or as 伈. It is also known as 㐭?.　[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club]? Lu Gan cut, sound. Suffering, very sleepy. Or make ling. [Former Han·Yangganquan Fu] Under the yin, it is miserable. [Note] It also means cold. I read it like the original character, and I feel disgusted. Add another look.　[Jiyun] Ju forbidden cutting, sound?. The heart is also timid.　Vulgar creation?, no.
